abstract: Philip Morris USA, the tobacco company, will test-market four flavors of a smokeless tobacco product known as snus under the Marlboro brand name.
snippet: Philip Morris USA, the tobacco company, will test-market four flavors of a smokeless tobacco product known as snus under the Marlboro brand name.
lead_paragraph: Philip Morris USA, the tobacco company, said late yesterday that it would test-market four flavors of a smokeless tobacco product known as snus under the Marlboro brand name in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, starting in August.

headline.main: Philip Morris Tries Smokeless Tobacco Product
headline.print_headline: Philip Morris Tries Smokeless Tobacco Product
